title: Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - 3 Packs 30 Feet Each Pre-Baited, Ready to Use Indoors & Outdoors. Bug Insect Infestation Sticky Adhesive Scented Green Color Barn Paper Sheet Disposable Non-Toxic
descriptions:
Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster

A simple way to catch flies, indoors or outdoors.

What it is:
- A long, green sticky paper that catches flies and other flying bugs.
- Comes in 3 rolls. Each roll is 30 feet long and 10 inches wide.
- Safe to use: non-toxic and scented to attract flies.
- Pre-baited and ready to use right out of the box. No spraying or mixing.

Easy to use:
1) Choose a spot where you see flies. Good places: kitchens, porches, barns, garages, waste rooms, or near doors and windows. Avoid areas where you use snap traps or rodent poisons.
2) Unroll the sticky paper to the length you want.
3) Hang it or tape it along a wall, beam, or near problem areas. Keep out of the reach of children and pets.
4) When it’s full, roll it up and throw it away. It’s disposable.

Why it helps:
- Works in normal, damp, or humid areas.
- Can cover a large area: up to 3,600 square inches per roll.
- Durable: under normal conditions, it stays effective for up to one full year.
- Good for homes, businesses, barns, animal areas, and places with many flies.

Good to know:
- Color: Green.
- Safe formula with a scent that draws flies to the trap.
- No electricity, no mess, and no harsh chemicals.
- Part of Intelligent Pest Management: use it regularly to reduce flies over time.

If you want an easy, safe, and long-lasting way to cut down on flies, just unroll, hang, and let the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster do the work.
